name: ext_R4_Consent_provision
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Consent.provision for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Consent.provision from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Consent|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: An exception to the base policy of this consent. An exception can be an addition or removal of access permissions.
element.comment: `Consent.provision` maps to R5 `Consent.provision`. Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
